WHO WE ARE
A trusted partner for AI&Robotics solutions driven by innovations at scale
THE FUTURE
ARV NOW
Our Vision
Partner of choice as an integrated AI & Robotics Solution provider.
OUR Mission
Bringing AI and Robotics Solutions to business enterprises, governments and consumers to enable them to capitalize on emerging AI & Robotics technologies. 
“
AI & Robotics Ventures (ARV)
is a venture building arm of PTTEP.

TECHNOLOGY DEVELOPMENT

As we are the technology spin-off company dedicated to leverage cutting-edge AI & Robotics technology, the technology development is one of our core company strategies.

Professional Services

ARV provides professional services and solutions for Oil & Gas and non-Oil & Gas business including facility inspection using our AI and Robotics technology across air/sea/land applications and through our business units.

Business Building

ARV innovates and develops new business S-Curves in our Venture Studio team.

INNOVATION PLATFORM

Through ARV network of clients and partners, we have resources to accelerate and invest in high potential start-ups to meet market demands. ARV’s headquarter is home to a shared workspace, facilities infrastructure, and access to network & playground for our partners.
ARV Timeline
Establishment of PTTEP Robot Club
PTTEP robotic club was established to develop robot to provide an alternative method enhancing PTTEP operation.
Successful first lab-scale prototype Autonomous Underwater Vehicle (AUV), name"Obsidian"
PTTEP collaborated with Kasetsart University developing the first model of Autonomous Underwater Vehicle (AUV), named "Obsidian", achieved 18th place of International Robosub 2014
The first in-house inspection UAV developed under PTTEP Robot Club was successful in the first field trial of live flare inspection at U-Thong oil field, PTTEP1, Suphanburi.
The first in-house inspection UAV developed under PTTEP Robot Club was successful in the first field trial of live flare inspection at U-Thong oil field, PTTEP1, Suphanburi.
Developing an upgraded version of Zeabus AUV, named “Zeabus II”
PTTEP collaborated with Kasetsart University developing an upgraded version of Zeabus AUV, named “Zeabus ll”, achieved 5h place of AUVSI International Robosub 2016
SUCCESSFUL FIELD-TRIAL OF IN-PIPE INSPECTION ROBOT
The first field-trial of in-pipe inspection robot was commenced at PTT Oil BU, Bangkok. The result of testing was satisfied.
A year to remember
PTTEP had involved in search and rescue operation for
 “Wild Boar” team lost in the cave at Chiang Rai province. The first sea trial of new pipeline inspection AUV was conducted with satisfaction. 
Al & Robotics Ventures (ARV) Company Limited was established in Sep 2018.
NAUTILUS
a subsea flow line control and repair robot (SFCR) developed by AI and Robotics Ventures Company Limited (ARV) and Kongsberg Ferrotech won the Award for Breakthrough Technological Project of the Year at the ADIPEC Awards 2020
Establishment of PTTEP Robot Club
PTTEP robotic club was established to develop robot to provide an alternative method enhancing PTTEP operation.
Successful first lab-scale prototype Autonomous Underwater Vehicle (AUV), name "Obsidian"
PTTEP collaborated with Kasetsart University developing the first model of Autonomous Underwater Vehicle (AUV), named "Obsidian", achieved 18th place of International Robosub 2014
Successful first field trial of live flare inspection by UAV,U-Thong, PTTEP1
The first in-house inspection UAV developed under PTTEP Robot Club was successful in the first field trial of live flare inspection at U-Thong oil field, PTTEP1, Suphanburi.
Developing an upgraded version of Zeabus AUV, named “Zeabus II”
PTTEP collaborated with Kasetsart University developing an upgraded version of Zeabus AUV, named “Zeabus ll”, achieved 5h place of AUVSI International Robosub 2016
Successful field-trial of in-pipe inspection robot
The first field-trial of in-pipe inspection robot was commenced at PTT Oil BU, Bangkok. The result of testing was satisfied.
2020 : NAUTILUS
a subsea flow line control and repair robot (SFCR) developed by AI and Robotics Ventures Company Limited (ARV) and Kongsberg Ferrotech won the Award for Breakthrough Technological Project of the Year at the ADIPEC Awards 2020
A year to remember
PTTEP had involved in search and rescue operation for “Wild Boar” team lost in the cave at Chiang Rai province. The first sea trial of new pipeline inspection AUV was conducted with satisfaction. Al & Robotics Ventures (ARV) Company Limited was established in Sep 2018.
